hadiths.text: Ibn Abbas reported:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) dressed himself, and then went out for prayer, when he was presented with bread and meat. He took three morsels out of that, and then offered prayer along with other people and did not touch water

chapter.ara-name: باب نَسْخِ " الْوُضُوءِ مِمَّا مَسَّتِ النَّارُ "
chapter.eng-name: Abrogation of wudu’ for that which has been touched by fire
